title._content: Perry, Horatio J. of Keene NH

description._content: TITLE Perry, Horatio J. of Keene NH CREATOR SUBJECT Men - NH - Keene Lawyers - NH - Keene DESCRIPTION Photograph of Horatio J. Perry of Keene New Hampshire. He was born in Keene in 1824, the son of Justus and Mary (Edwards) Perry and graduated from Harvard in 1844. He studied law and joined the U.S. forces during the Mexican war. He was later appointed to Spain during Pres. Taylor's administration in 1849 and held that position for 20 years. In 1852 he married Carolina Corenado, the poet-laureate of Spain. He died in Lisbon Portugal in 1891. PUBLISHER Keene Public Library DATE DIGITAL 20080229 DATE ORIGINAL RESOURCE TYPE photographs FORMAT image/jpg RESOURCE IDENTIFIER hsykppl018 RIGHTS MANAGMENT No known restriction on publication.
